quotes.quote: Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: If we had no winter, the spring would not be so pleasant: if we did not sometimes taste of adversity, prosperity would not be so welcome.
quotes.author: Anne Bradstreet

quotes.quote:
By courage I repel adversity.
(Adversa Virtute Repello)
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: He knows not his own strength that hath not met adversity.
quotes.author: Ben Jonson

quotes.quote: Be more prompt to go to a friend in adversity than in prosperity.
quotes.author: Chilo

quotes.quote: Friendship make prosperity more shining and lessens adversity by dividing and sharing it.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Adversity is the touchstone of friendship.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: Adversity is the trial of principle. Without it a man hardly knows whether he is honest or not.
quotes.author: Henry Fielding

quotes.quote: He that can heroically endure adversity will bear prosperity with equal greatness of the soul; for the mind that cannot be dejected by the former is not likely to be transported without the latter.
quotes.author: Henry Fielding

quotes.quote: In adversity remember to keep an even mind.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: You will never truly know yourself or the strength of your relationships until both have been tested by adversity.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: In prosperity our friends know us; in adversity we know our friends.
quotes.author: John Churton Collins

quotes.quote: Adversity does teach who your real friends are.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: By trying we can easily learn to endure adversity -- another man's I mean.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: By trying we can easily learn to endure adversity. Another man's, I mean.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Always seek out the seed of triumph in every adversity.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Prosperity makes friends, adversity tries them.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Fire is the test of gold; adversity, of strong men.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Remember that there is nothing stable in human affairs; therefore avoid undue elation in prosperity, or undue depression in adversity.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Adversity causes some men to break; others to break records.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: A man I am cross'd with adversity.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote:
A wretched soul, bruised with adversity,
We bid be quiet when we hear it cry;
But were we burdened with like weight of pain,
As much or more we should ourselves complain.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Let me embrace thee, sour adversity, for wise men say it is the wisest course.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote:
Sweet are the uses of adversity,
Which like the toad, ugly and venomous,
Wears yet a precious jewel in his head;
And this our life, exempt from public haunt,
Finds tongues in trees, books in the running brooks,
Sermons in stones, and good in everything.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Sweet are the uses of adversity, which, like a toad, though ugly and venomous, wears yet a precious jewel in its head.
